company.tagline: The Fastest AI Inference Platform & Hardware
company.description: SambaNova strives to be the most efficient and adaptable AI platform on the planet. Our AI solution is designed to empower enterprises to control the trajectory of their data and AI future. Founded in 2017, SambaNova innovates at every layer of the AI stack to deliver a fully integrated AI platform that serves as the technology backbone for the next generation of AI computing and innovation.
company.target_customers: Enterprises, Government & Public Sector, Data Centers

events.title: SambaNova Model Bundling: Unlocking Efficiency for AI Inference and Agentic Workflows
events.description: Launch of the SambaNova Model Bundling aimed at enhancing efficiency for AI inference and agentic workflows.

events.title: Redefining AI Infrastructure in a Power-Constrained World
events.description: Introduction of new solutions addressing AI infrastructure challenges in power-constrained environments.

events.title: From Insight to Action with SambaNova Agents
events.description: Launch focusing on transforming insights into actions using SambaNova Agents.

events.title: SambaNova and CrewAI Partner to Deliver Agentic AI at Scale on CrewAI AMP
events.description: Partnership with CrewAI to provide scalable agentic AI solutions on CrewAI AMP.

events.title: Introducing the SambaNova SDK
events.description: Launch of SambaNova SDK facilitating easier development with their AI technology.

events.title: Start Building with The Fastest DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus
events.description: Announcement of the launch of DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus for development.

events.title: Unlock Enterprise-Grade Security with Open-Source AI on SambaNova
events.description: Introduction of enterprise-grade security features with open-source AI offerings.

events.title: SambaNova Named to FORTUNE Future 50 List for Second Consecutive Year
events.description: Recognition as part of the FORTUNE Future 50 List for the second year in a row.

events.title: Start Building with Lightning-Fast GPT-OSS 120B on SambaCloud
events.description: Launch announcement for building with the new GPT-OSS 120B model on SambaCloud.

events.title: DeepSeek-V3.1 Is Live on SambaCloud
events.description: Announcement that the DeepSeek-V3.1 model is now available on SambaNova Cloud.
